column5: Hits the nail on the head I'd say....

Its easy to do better and try harder. The catch is how long can they endure and keep it up day after day month after month, year after year. Now thats the tough part.  Where Tony Robbins when we need him? LOL (or is Anthony Robbins)

I just wanted to say thanks.  I read this earlier today and it had a profound affect on me.  I was in a dark place...I took control of it...took responsibility for what I owned and I paid a visit to people that I have been hurting.  Anyway...I have learnt to not share too too much out in the open and that I need to pay attention to my own heart and fix what I can while I still can.
